data.title: Stuttering sentences
data.statement:
A normal sentence is clear, but Am A Ammmmmmmmmm stuttering Ammmmmmmm sentence Amm is Ammmm like Ammmm that !

To form a stuttering sentence, each word is preceded by {{A}} plus a number of {{m}}'s equal to the length of the word plus a space character. Digits and punctuation marks have no effect. This means that, for every word, the length does not take into account the non-alphabetic characters (0 to 9, ? \ / - + * ; [ ] ).

If a "word" consists of non-alphabetic characters only (e.g. "3579"), the "word" is output without any modification.

testCases.title: Multiple words Validator
testCases.testOut: Ammm End Amm of Ammm the Ammmmm words

testCases.title: Ignore punctuation
testCases.testOut: Ammmm What Amm is Ammmm your Ammmm name?

testCases.title: Ignore punctuation Validator
testCases.testOut: Ammmm What Amm is Ammmm your Ammmmmmmm favorite Ammmmm color?

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: Every day, you have to write some code
testCases.testOut: Ammmmm Every Ammm day, Ammm you Ammmm have Amm to Ammmmm write Ammmm some Ammmm code

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testOut: Ammm You Ammmm have Am a Ammm new Ammmmm email!

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn: Your car park is at the number 600.
testCases.testOut: Ammmm Your Ammm car Ammmm park Amm is Amm at Ammm the Ammmmmm number 600.

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: Do you really put 5000 euros every year on tobacco?
testCases.testOut: Amm Do Ammm you Ammmmmm really Ammm put 5000 Ammmmm euros Ammmmm every Ammmm year Amm on Ammmmmmm tobacco?

testCases.title: Test 6
testCases.testIn: I want a falafel (delicious vegan wrap) + apple juice.
testCases.testOut: Am I Ammmm want Am a Ammmmmmm falafel Ammmmmmmmm (delicious Ammmmm vegan Ammmm wrap) + Ammmmm apple Ammmmm juice.

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testOut: 1/10 Amm of Ammmmm Covid Ammmmm tests Ammm are Ammmmmmmmmm inaccurate!

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A normal sentence is clear, but Am A Ammmmmmmmmm stuttering Ammmmmmmm sentence Amm is Ammmm like Ammmm that !

To form a stuttering sentence, each word is preceded by A plus a number of m's equal to the length of the word plus a space character. Digits and punctuation marks have no effect. This means that, for every word, the length does not take into account the non-alphabetic characters (0 to 9, ? \ / - + * ; [ ] ).

If a "word" consists of non-alphabetic characters only (e.g. "3579"), the "word" is output without any modification.
Input
Line 1: A normal sentence
Output
Line 1: A stuttering sentence
Constraints
Example
Input
Hello
Output
Ammmmm Hello
